PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-08482018-06-21,  ,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations and the Natural Health Products Regulations (Vaping Products)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS AND THE NATURAL HEALTH PRODUCTS REGULATIONS (VAPING PRODUCTS) in order to ensure that the application of the TOBACCO AND VAPING PRODUCTS ACT, FOOD AND DRUG ACT and their regulations, on vaping products regulated under the FDA, is representative of their associated harms while achieving the purposes of the TOBACCO AND VAPING PRODUCTS ACT.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0132 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
AttachmentsAttachment
